title: Find Maximum Number
description:
Given three integers, return the maximum among them.

Example:
Input: a = 5, b = 10, c = 3
Output: 10
Explanation: 10 is the largest among 5, 10, and 3

functionSignature.java: int findMax(int a, int b, int c)
functionSignature.cpp: int findMax(int a, int b, int c)
